HomePage.title: Hello, I'm Teddy Setiady
HomePage.titleDesc: Full Stack Developer | Turning Ideas into Reality
HomePage.desc: I am a full stack developer from Medan, North Sumatra. With 3 years of experience building innovative web applications and extensive expertise in the latest technologies, I am ready to help you achieve your digital goals.
HomePage.workExperienceDesc: My experience is in the industrial field

Kerja.title: MBE Towing

desc.paragraf: During my time at MBE Towing, I was responsible for developing and implementing digital marketing strategies aimed at increasing sales and leads. My key responsibilities included:
tanggungJawab: Designing and managing Google Ads and Google Business campaigns to maximize lead generation.
Drafting official company letters and business partnership documents, including tailored proposals to meet specific business needs.
Overseeing the creation, maintenance, and updates of the company's website, ensuring that articles were regularly uploaded to enhance SEO.
Adjusting the website's homepage design to ensure an attractive and user-friendly interface.

pencapaian: Increased sales by 200% in the first year through effective digital marketing strategies.
Achieved a steady 6% monthly sales growth during the third year.
Successfully improved website ranking for key terms such as 'car towing in Medan' and 'towing Medan' through optimized article content for SEO.

About.metaTitle: About Teddy Setiady - Full Stack Developer
About.metaDescription: Learn more about Teddy Setiady, a Full Stack Developer with 3 years of experience in web development.
About.title: About Me
About.desc1: My name is Teddy Setiady, I am a full stack developer from Medan, North Sumatra.
About.desc2: Having a high interest in the world of technology since junior high school, I started learning the basics of programming in 2014. I managed to win third place in a robotics competition held in 2017 at the city level.
About.desc3: With over 3 years of experience, I have successfully built various complex web and mobile applications for several companies and educational foundations in Medan.
About.desc4: Furthermore, I also have expertise in creating Arduino-based devices and can determine the hardware and sensor requirements according to client requests. Not only programming skills, I also have SEO optimization capabilities and can run Google Ads campaigns.
About.desc5: I believe that technology can be used to make positive changes, and I am very enthusiastic about collaborating on exciting projects.

Project.metaDescription: Explore the projects developed by Teddy Setiady, including web applications and Arduino-based devices.
